attributes.action: For Arsene Wenger To Resign As Manager Of Arsenal Football Club
attributes.additional_details: Arsene Wenger has not won a cup for Arsenal in seven years, he has sucked the club dry of any success. I am a life long Arsenal fan and I believe this is a very important issue. This man is ruining my respect, love and passion for my club. Parliament must discuss this issue. Arsenal is being ruined!
